display_long_description:
# Your father’s legacy was more than just a story. It was a mystery waiting to be uncovered.

When he passed, he left you his most treasured possession: the **Light Crystal**, a key to an ancient truth long buried by time.

Determined to complete his life’s work and prove the world wrong, you set out on a quest to uncover the origins of humanity’s first civilization.

With your loyal companion Jack by your side, you step into the unknown where secrets whisper through forgotten ruins and the truth is waiting to be revealed.

[media]

This is where your **journey begins**, a quest into the heart of **Epyka**, a mythological world lost to time.

Every step forward is a test. **Bravery. Skill. Teamwork. Wit.**

Only those who can **solve the puzzles, decipher the clues, and unlock the secrets of the past** will prove themselves worthy of wandering Epyka’s mighty halls.

But be warned. Ancient forces stir beneath the surface, watching your every move.
A forgotten evil waits in the shadows, eager to challenge those who dare seek the truth.

Do you have what it takes to **unravel the mysteries of Epyka and fulfil your destiny?**

# Reviews

- “The lighting effects are gorgeous and add to the mood beautifully, whether we're on the sunny beach of our first island, a  gloomy cave mid-game, or in the molten core of a volcano. Everything  looks great” - Upload VR

- “The team at Singular Perception has crafted a delightful story that guides you as you navigate the beautifully designed mysterious island, tackling its challenges and puzzles” - The VR Realm

# Solve Immersive Puzzles
[media]

# Join together in dreamwork
[media]

# Discover supernatural powers
[media]

# Live through an Intriguing story
[media]

# Fight an epic battle
[media]

Join our **Discord** to discuss the game with other Epykians and hear about future updates! https://discord.gg/x7VraYdUCd
